summary:
Orthopedic surgery focuses on treating problems with bones, joints, muscles, and related tissues. Orthopedic surgeons help patients with various issues, such as:
- Injuries from accidents or sports.
- Back problems and spine diseases.
- Conditions like arthritis (degenerative diseases).
- Infections and tumors in the musculoskeletal system.
- Birth defects affecting bones and joints.

They use different methods, including surgery and non-surgical treatments, to help patients recover and improve their movement and overall health.
title: Orthopedic surgery
